cells.data:
on McMaster-Carr, filter search query `timing belt pulleys` by:
- maximum-belt = 10mm
- Teeth Shape = Trapezoidal

For now, the two components are going to be: (From McMaster Carr)
For gear 1, many choices depending on the size of the wheels.
- Choice 1:[Gear1 - pitch_diameter=57.31mm, outer-diameter = 63](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N35)
- Choice 2: [Gear1 - pitch_diameter=63.66mm, outer-diameter=66.7mm ](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N36)
- Choice 3: [Gear1 - pitch_diameter=76.42mm, outer-diameter= n/a](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N37)
- Choice 4: [Gear1 - pitch_diameter=95.52mm, outer-diameter= N/a](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N38)

Wheel diameter for Travis: 60 mm
Wheel thickness for Travis: 45 mm
- Optimal choice: [Gear 1 - pitch_diameter=40mm, outer-diameter=44mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N3)

For gear 2: only one choice that's the smallest
[Gear2 - pitch_diameter=16.05 mm, outer-diameter 20 mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N2) This is the smallest one. The shaft diameter might not match that of the motor, but will modify file in cad.

**Final:**
<!--- Optimal choice: [Gear 1 - pitch_diameter=40mm, outer-diameter=44mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N5)-->
<!--- Optimal choice: [Gear 2 - pitch_diameter=16.05mm, outer-diameter=20mm](https://www.mcmaster.com/1428n4)-->

<!--- Optimal Choice gear 1 https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N54-->
<!--- opimtal choice gear 2 https://www.mcmaster.com/1428N41-->

optimal choice gear 1: https://www.traceparts.com/en/product/gates-pulley-htd-5m-width-15-mm-number-of-teeth-32-bore-diameter-2-mm?Product=32-30092010-109669&PartNumber=32%205M%20%2015#

optimal choice gear 2:
https://www.traceparts.com/en/product/gates-pulley-htd-5m-width-15-mm-number-of-teeth-14-bore-diameter-2-mm?Product=32-30092010-109669&PartNumber=14%205M%20%2015
[About matching gears with the M's on timing belts](https://www.electric-skateboard.builders/t/belt-length-belts-width-and-belts-pitch/26589)
